patterns: Tell me some interesting fact or lore
Something I dont know about the lore
responses: Corkis chopper is called the Reconnaissance Operations Front-Line Copter (ROFL Copter)
Warwick was the master of Singed before Soraka turned him into a wolf
Heimer created Yi's goggles with 7 lenses for him so he could expand his line of sight
Cassiopeia and Katarina are sisters, Cass is half snake now because she was cursed by magic sword
Singed was actually the first champion that began development in League of Legends
Blitzcrank Runs a Dating Service in His Spare Time, As he calls it 'Fleshling Compatibility Services'
Teemo was created inspired by the smiling grim emoji. And Teemo is an Anagram of emote
Jinx Dances Like Jake from Adventure Time
Miss fortune's guns were created by her mother for young Gangplank, who turned the guns on their creator
Garen & Lux are siblings of the Crownguard family who traditionally serve as the royal protectors
Many frost Trolls have rallied behind the self proclaimed 'Troll King' Trundle. He named his weapon 'BoneShiver'
Khada Jhin is a stage name, His true identity still remains a mystery
With his dying breath Sion killed Jarvan I. The king's crown now serves as Sion's Jaw
Rumble's mech is named Tristy, Because Tristana was very important to him.
Jax's favorite food is eggs, particularly the ones from a specfic shop in Shurima
